page.title: 20Credits
page.content: Class 5 of Croft Primary School has collected the information contained in this project.They are,Rachel Glover,Ann Marie Eliseou,Alison Toach,Katie Roe,Ruth Buckler,Kay Spencer,Melanie Armstrong,Michelle Hardiman,Louise Laing,Louise Satchwell,Julie Northen,Julie Malyon,Lindsey Swain,Joanna Phillips,Lydia Lane,Kim Saunders,Helen Lymbery,Churni Ghatak,Karl Peacock,Simon Pugh,Robert Lane,Ben Borderick,Iain Davis,Jonathan Tallis,Ivor Seabrook,David Jacques,Richard Armstrong,Robin Jameson,Daniel Bingham,Ian Bromley,Simon Bodycote,Andrew Crofts, Kevin Hayward,and,Mr George.They would like to thank all the people of Croft and Stoney Stanton who helped them.Special thanks are given to Mr Law and Mr Dodds, the headteacher.
